attributes.action: Allow a classic book that has been read to children for as long as I can remember!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to petition against the idea of not allowing our children to read the story of the 3 little pigs, due to the fact that it MAY be offensive to the Muslim culture! Please allow this classic to continue to be read so it can be appreciated by the next generation of children, surely we should be able to as individuals make our own decisions on what literature we read.

rejection.details: People are free to read this story.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
